package x

import (
	"encoding/json"
	"errors"
	"reflect"
	"testing"
)

type customMutator struct {
	Mutations int
	// These are bools, not errors, so that they can survive serialization to a worker process.
	MarshalErr   bool
	UnmarshalErr bool
	MutateErr    bool
}

func (m *customMutator) MarshalBinary() ([]byte, error) {
	if m.MarshalErr {
		return nil, errors.New("injected")
	}
	return json.Marshal(m)
}
func (m *customMutator) UnmarshalBinary(data []byte) error {
	if err := json.Unmarshal(data, m); err != nil {
		return err
	}
	// UnmarshalErr must be checked after unmarshaling.
	if m.UnmarshalErr {
		return errors.New("injected")
	}
	return nil
}
func (m *customMutator) Mutate(seed int64) error {
	if m.MutateErr {
		return errors.New("injected")
	}
	m.Mutations++
	return nil
}

func FuzzSuccessEmptyCorpus(f *testing.F) {
	f.Fuzz(func(t *testing.T, got *customMutator) {
		if want := (&customMutator{Mutations: 1}); !reflect.DeepEqual(got, want) {
			t.Errorf("got %#v, want %#v", got, want)
		}
	})
}

func FuzzSuccessWithTestdata(f *testing.F) {
	f.Fuzz(func(t *testing.T, got *customMutator) {
		if want := (&customMutator{Mutations: 10}); !reflect.DeepEqual(got, want) {
			t.Errorf("got %#v, want %#v", got, want)
		}
	})
}

func FuzzSuccessWithCachedSeed(f *testing.F) {
	f.Fuzz(func(t *testing.T, got *customMutator) {
		if want := (&customMutator{Mutations: 100}); !reflect.DeepEqual(got, want) {
			t.Errorf("got %#v, want %#v", got, want)
		}
	})
}

func FuzzSuccessWithAddedSeed(f *testing.F) {
	f.Add(&customMutator{Mutations: 1000})
	f.Fuzz(func(t *testing.T, got *customMutator) {
		if want := (&customMutator{Mutations: 1000}); !reflect.DeepEqual(got, want) {
			t.Errorf("got %#v, want %#v", got, want)
		}
	})
}

var podState *customMutator

type customMutatorPod int

func (customMutatorPod) MarshalBinary() ([]byte, error) { return podState.MarshalBinary() }
func (customMutatorPod) UnmarshalBinary(d []byte) error { return podState.UnmarshalBinary(d) }
func (customMutatorPod) Mutate(s int64) error           { return podState.Mutate(s) }

func FuzzSuccessPod(f *testing.F) {
	podState = &customMutator{}
	f.Fuzz(func(t *testing.T, v customMutatorPod) {
		if got, want := podState, (&customMutator{Mutations: 1}); !reflect.DeepEqual(got, want) {
			t.Errorf("got %#v, want %#v", got, want)
		}
	})
}

}

	f.Add(&customMutator{MarshalErr: true})
	f.Fuzz(func(t *testing.T, got *customMutator) {})
